entry.string: What is it?
The Privileges module lets you manage access rights on your site. Privileges give roles access to certain resources of your choosing. They are the basic components of the security system.
Here are some of the things you can do with privileges:
entry.translation: Hier zijn enkele van de zaken die u kunt bewerkstelligen met privileges:

entry.string: Xaraya's privileges are extremely flexible. You can define privileges at the level of site, modules, component classes within modules, or single instances of those classes.
entry.translation: De privileges van Xaraya zijn uiterst flexibel. U kunt privileges definiëren op het niveau van de site, de modules, componentklassen binnen module, of enkelvoudige instanties van deze klassen.

entry.string: You can use privileges as building blocks. Assemble them into compound privileges tailored to any specific role on the site.
entry.translation: U kunt privileges gebruiken als bouwstenen. Verzamel ze in samengestelde privileges op maat gemaakt voor een specifieke rol binnen de site.

entry.string: You can assign privileges to roles which then pass them on to their children in the roles hierarchy through inheritance.
entry.translation: U kunt privileges toekennen en deze vervolgens doorgeven aan hun kinderen in de rollen hiërarchie door overerving.

entry.string: Using the realms functionality you can subdivide one site into many "virtual" sites sharing the same resources.
entry.translation: Het gebruik van de 'gebieds' functionaliteit maakt het mogelijk verschillende beveiligingsgebieden te definieren die dezelfde onderdelen binnen de site gebruiken.

entry.string: How to use it?

Clicking on the View Privileges link gives you an overview of all the privileges on your system. Compound privileges are collapsed, but you can click on them to open them up and view their components.
entry.translation: Door op 'toon privileges' te klikken wordt een overzicht getoond van de beschikbare privileges. Samengestelde privileges zijn compact weergegeven, maar u kunt deze uitklappen en hun componenten bekijken.

entry.string: When adding or modifying a privilege, you can define it to have its own access rights, or simply to serve as a container for other privileges.
Xaraya comes preconfigured with a minimal set of privileges that are loaded when you run the installer. These will vary according to the configuration you chose. Examples are:
Administration: a privilege that gives a role complete access to all resources on the site. At installation this privilege is assigned to the role Administrators and is inherited by the user Admin.
CasualAccess: this is the privilege assigned to unregistered users on the site. It is initially defined to allow viewing access of the front page, as well as access to the login block.
GeneralLock: a privilege that restricts access to certain basic roles and privileges the system requires, such as the default admin. This is to avoid inadvertent removal.

All privileges in the system can be changed or removed. (For those protected by GeneralLock above this takes a bit more doing.) You can also combine privileges by using them as elements to create compound privileges, or make new privileges of your choosing. There is no limit to the number of privileges you can create or their levels of nesting.
entry.translation: Alle privileges in het systeem kunnen worden gewijzigd of verwijderd (Voor de privileges die worden beschermd door 'GeneralLock' moet er wat meer moeite worden gedaan). U kunt ook privileges combineren door ze als elementen te gebruiken in samengestelde privileges, of nieuwe privileges naar keuze aanmaken. Er is geen limiet aan het aantal privileges of het aantal niveaus dat genest kan worden.
